name: Harvard I/O 2014
description:
Harvard I/O is an annual event organized by the Harvard Innovation, Technology, and Entrepreneurship Collaboration (HITEC). I was asked to do graphic design for the event, including the flyer shown here. My designs were also used in the event's website, and the event pamphlet.

The inspiration was to combine flat design, bold colors, and clean lines to catch the viewer's eye and promote a sense of modernity.
